entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Ottawa (Kanata - Orléans)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:49 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 7.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 5:00 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 7.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 59 %
Dewpoint: 0.1°C
Wind: SW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
